body_html:
I would really like to have a way to customize the tag name shown in tensorboard.
I could send a PR by simply adding an optional keyword argument to all the tf.summary.something functions. Does that sound like an acceptable solution or are there any design concerns?
body_text:
I would really like to have a way to customize the tag name shown in tensorboard.
I could send a PR by simply adding an optional keyword argument to all the tf.summary.something functions. Does that sound like an acceptable solution or are there any design concerns?
body:
I would really like to have a way to customize the tag name shown in tensorboard. 
I could send a PR by simply adding an optional keyword argument to all the `tf.summary.something` functions. Does that sound like an acceptable solution or are there any design concerns?
